column5: Heyy guys  I was over at Bills Bait saturday for their sale so I picked up an Eagle Claw Ultra Light rod spinning combo, don't know if anyone has used this before but if you have what are your thought on it?  And I plan to be going out to bps in a weed or so do get a new bass/walleye combo just wondering if anyone has any suggestions on what I should get along with walleye lures?  Thankssss
The Eagle Claw rods have always been dependable. Never experienced one of their a reels.,
